page.title: 20 HOUDINI
page.content: On the school field we found a small caterpillar it was hairy and prickly.It's colours were Black,Orange and White with Red eyes.It moved very strangely it was moving some parts of the body and leaving some behind.We picked it up and found it shrugged and clinched onto anything.It had fourteen legs and on paper could move very quickly.Then it escaped but two days later we found him again. Day 1:Found Houdini on school hedge whilst looking for bird-nests.We called him Houdini because he could escape from anything. Day 2:Houdini had escaped so we looked but couldn't find him Day 3:Found Houdini and gave him another bed because former one was wet Day 4:Houdini kept escaping out of our tub and kept getting bigger by the minute. By J.WATSON & B.HEMSLEY.
